ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Indrayudh of Cooch Behar, a famous theatre group was formed on the 8th June, 1974 under the government registration No. S/IL/12629. As Rome was not built in a day , Indrayudh was not built in a day also. There was much ups and down - but the dedication ,determination , and dicipline alongwith sincierity has brought the success during the last 37 years. At present Indrayudh has staged 71 dramas with the achievement of 856 shows . The fame of Indrayudh not only spread in West Bengal but its fame has been spread in the state of U.P, M.P, Assam , Orrissa, and Nagaland .Indrayudh also successfully staged their drama program there . So far the group theatre movement in concern , Indrayudh holding the flag of the same , taking the leading part. Indrayudh has won number of prizes in several drama competition in defferent times . This performances were made in local drama competition , in Kolkata and in the other state. Indrayudh has organized drama festivals where leading thetre group of Bangladesh chokh had participated . apart from that the leading theatrical teams of Kolkata as well as other district of W.B with there eminent artist has staged their drama on the invitation of Indrayudh in time to time.

Promoter Directors of this Group is having vast business and work experience of working in leading economies of the World, including United States, European Union, Far East countries, not to mention our very own Indian domestic market. Despite being a relatively young company, it has drawn together a rather impressive list of tie-ups, with alliances and collaborations, foraying into uncharted business territory. Guided by competent leaders, in partnership with some of the worldâ€™s top Multinational Corporations, the companyâ€™s workforce has thus far been successful in helping the organization grow exponentially: both in terms of magnitude as well as the nature of the work done. Mission INDUS Groupsâ€™ mission is to implement ground - breaking methodologies and technologies in delivering industry - specific IT / Non IT solutions that answers major business challenges and empower the youth for greater heights tomorrow. INDUS group achieves its mission through enabling paradigm shifts using its technological expertise, a collaborative approach, a passionate team of professionals that are bound to instill a sense of trust in the client/partner, as well as exposure of those in the upper echelons of management to the best industry practices across the globe. What we stand for Our corporate objective is to offer global vision with a personal touch in the education and application service industry, bridging the information gap to enable students / beneficiaries make the wisest decision on future career paths, represent partner institutionsâ€™ best interest to deliver quality rather than quantity and facilitate greater public awareness among prospective students, parents, academics and recruiters. We understand that our partner/clients value quality more than quantity and hope to achieve better results, thus our service has been tailored to optimize offer and enrolment conversion rates. Walking the Talk In keeping with this belief, Indus has involved itself in numerous multidimensional projects that have had far-reaching social impacts at the grass root level. With dedicated professionals, INDUS Group has proved itself to be a path breaker in terms of offering new and innovative services leading to mutual profitability. INDUS Group has grown consistently over the past few years and is expected to continue this upward spiral in the coming years as well. The Legacy of Indus group lies in the fact of having skilled more than 6 lakhs students in its presence of a decade. In its network of more than 225 centers across East and NE India, Indus has trained more than 200000 beneficiaries in Job focused vocational streams with an average placement track record of more than 70%. Partnering global Industry leaders like, Microsoft, HP, Siemens, Tata Motors, G4S Securitus, Bourneville College, UK and many more domestic big names like, NISST, Ministry of Steel, GOI; SIS Securities; Floras Beauty, Indus brings on table relevant Industry Certification and job placement through its placement team in more than 127 companies within India. Indus has consistently been adopting policies keeping in mind the fact that the results of the projects should be beneficial to our esteemed clients and partners leading to customer satisfaction by reaching to the ultimate goal of the targeted stake holder. Leverage through various outsourcing models. We Promise You: Complete customer orientation, a responsive attitude to your needs, Better solutions with a faster turnaround time and predictability. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Institute For Motivating Self Employment popularly known as IMSE is a voluntary social organization of national repute working in the field of rural and urban development for more than last four decades. IMSE headquarters is located at Kolkata and its working areas are spread over a few hundred remote villages in West Bengal, Jharkhand and Odisha. IMSE has made significant progress in terms of implementing a good number of projects for the development of the poorest of the poor particularly rural and poor women and children in hundreds of villages of its working areas. The major activities of IMSE includes explaining to the people about hunger from a rights perspective, mobilizing poor to access productive resources without discrimination, animators training for promoting genuine agrarian reform to safeguard rights of small & marginal peasants and agricultural labourers, empowering indigenous communities to attain their rights, gender mainstreaming in all its activities and some gender specific activities like self help group promotion, training of anganwadi workers, running of short stay home, training of women panchayat members and so on. Promotion of sustainable agriculture and land and water management for protection of the ecology and environment are also two major programmes of IMSE. IMSE has played important role in developing various networks of NGOs CSOs working in the various fields of development.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: INTERNATIONAL VIKAS FOUNDATION, A PHILANTHROPIC ORGANIZATION, WAS INITIATED BY MR. BHAGYADHAR SAHA ON 20TH DAY OF JULY 2009. IT HAS BEEN REGISTERED AS A PUBLIC CHARITABLE TRUST UNDER THE INDIAN TRUSTS ACT, 1882. IT IS ALSO REGISTERED AS A PUBLIC CHARITABLE TRUST UNDER SECTION 12AA OF THE INDIAN INCOME TAX ACT,1961, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, MINISTRY OF FINANCE, GOVERNMENT OF INDIA AND APPROVED UNDER SECTION 80G OF THE INDIAN INCOME TAX ACT,1961, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, MINISTRY OF FINANCE, GOVERNMENT OF INDIA . THE TRUST HAS BEEN PROMOTED WITH THE OBJECTIVE OF BRINGING HIGHLY MOTIVATED AND EDUCATED YOUTH TO THE DEVELOPMENT SECTOR. THEY WOULD WORK ON BRINGING OUT NEW INNOVATIONS IN RURAL DEVELOPMENT AND FOR UPSCALING DEVELOPMENT, INTERVENTIONS TO ERADICATE POVERTY IN VAST AREAS OF THE COUNTRY AS WELL AS WORLD.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MAJOR ACTIVITIES: OUR MAJOR WORK AREA HAS BEEN IN THE FIELD OF MENTAL HEALTH. WE WORK THROUGH 7 PROJECTS AIMED AT RESTORING THE DIGNITY OF PERSONS WITH PSYCHOSOCIAL DISABILITY. NAYA DAUR - Community based Outreach Programme from 2007 for homeless persons with mental illness by providing interventions through medicines, nutrition care & psychosocial interventions. DIC - Day Care centre for providing psychosocial interventions to street clients since 2009. AROGYA - Emergency hospital services for homeless persons with psychosocial disability since 2010. SARBARI - Special shelter for urban homeless women with psychosocial disability since 2010. SAMBANDHAN - Urban Mental Health & support services run in collaboration with Municipality Wards Primary Health care units. MARUDYAN - Shelter for homeless men with psychosocial disability since 2015. RESTORATION UNIT - Focusing on client tailored vocational and literacy training, livelihood & home-based or community-based resettlement MAJOR ACHIEVEMENTS: 1) HUDCO AWARDS for Best Practices to Improve the Living Environment. 2) STATE AWARD for Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities 2016, in the category of Outstsanding Institution.

ngoList.title: JHARGRAM LEPROSY PROJECT
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: JHARGRAM LEPROSY PROJECT (GLRA) A REGD. NGO IS ENGAGED IN NATIONAL LEPROSY CONTROL PROGRAMMEE ON SET PATTERN SINCE 1977 AS PER GUIDELINE OF GOVT. OF INDIA & STATE GOVT. THIS PROJECT IS SITUATED ABOUT 180 KM FROM KOLKATA COVERING MAXIMUM TRIBAL AREAS. THIS PROJECT IS WORKING IS THE MUNICIPAL & RURAL AREAS PARTICULARS IN THE FIELD OF IEC, DPMR SERVICES WITH GENERAL HEALTH CARE IN PROVIDING REFERRAL AND SUPPORTING SERVICES IN THE CHANGED SINARIO OF LEPROSY. MORE THAN 16000 LEPROSY VICTIMS FROM PROJECT AREA AND NEARBY 3000 FROM OUTSIDE AVAILED THE BENEFIT OF MDT AS WELL AS DPMR SERVICE. ROUTINE ACTIVITY OF THE PROJECT WERE IEC/IPC, DOOR TO DOOR VISIT, TO THE HEALTHY FAMILY AS WELL AS CARE FAMILY FOR HEALTH AWARENESS CAMPAIGN IN THE SCHOOL & COLLEGES TO CONDUCT MEETING AT PANCHAYET ALONG WITH MIKING IN THE VILLAGE, HAT. JLP PLAYS A VITAL ROLE IN DPMR ACTIVITIES IN RUNNING DPMR CLINICS AND CAMPS IN DIFFERENT AREAS OF JHARGRAM, KHARAGPUR, MEDINIPUR ETC. THIS PROJECT HAS BEEN PROVIDING SELF CARE TEACHING TO THE PATIENTS AND FAMILY MEMBERS AND THE PERSON STAYING AT LEPROSY COLONIES SIDE BY SIDE PROVIDING REGULAR DRESSING SERVICES. THIS PROJECT HAS GOT ACTIVE PARTICIPATION RCS PROG. SO FAR 90 RCS CASE RECEIVED FULL PHYSIO THERAPY SERVICE FROM THIS PROJECT. THIS PROJECT HAS BEEN CONDUCTING REGULAR SKIN CLINIC ON EVERY SATURDAY. DURING THIS YEAR ABOUT 1000 PERSONS AVAILED THE CLINIC FACILITIES.THIS PROJECT ALSO INVOLVED IN RNTCP UNDER SCHEME -1 WITH NECESSARY APPROVAL FROM THE DIST. TB SOCIETY.
